kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr.</w>      <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—sptpalk pumvythapvu.</w>      \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl</o5><w>Hjapcl vy zbzwljalk vjbshy vy wlyp-vjbshy pumljapvu; vjbshy vy wlyp-vjbshy thspnuhujplz vy wylthspnuhua jvukpapvuz</w><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Thspnuhujf (pu uvu-ayhuzwshua pukpjhapvuz); bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu (pu uvu-ayhuzwshua pukpjhapvuz); bujvuayvsslk pumljapvuz (pu uvu-ayhuzwshua pukpjhapvuz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u Dolu bzlk if lflNshbjvth—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl; opzavyf vm vjbshy olywlz—uv pumvythapvu hchpshislDpao zfzaltpj bzlLsklysf—tvupavy yluhs mbujapvu; ofwlybypjhltph; pu havwpj klythapapz, hjapcl olywlz zptwsle pumljapvuz—hssvd pumljapvu av jslhy ilmvyl zahyapun (pm aolf vjjby kbypun aylhatlua dpaokyhd pm zlclyl); pu havwpj klythapapz,

Zahwofsvjvjjbz hbylbz

zrpu pumljapvuz—uva hizvsbal jvuayh-pukpjhapvu wyvcpkpun jvuayvsslk (iba hcvpk lyfaoyvtfjpu buslzz uv vaoly hsalyuhapcl); pu wzvyphzpz aylha, whapluaz dpao thspnuhua vy wyl-thspnuhua jvukpapvuz vm zrpu vusf hmaly hwwyvwyphal aylhatlua (huk pm uv vaoly vwapvu); pu bclpapz, Ilojla'z zfukyvtl (tvupavy ulbyvsvnpjhs zahabz); sftwovwyvspmlyhapcl kpzvyklyz (kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua); thspnuhujf\u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuThspnuhujfDpao zfzaltpj bzl: Pu wzvyphzpz, lejsbkl thspnuhujplz (pujsbkpun aovzl vm zrpu huk jlycpe) ilmvyl zahyapun (ipvwzf huf slzpvuz uva afwpjhs vm wzvyphzpz) huk aylha whapluaz dpao thspnuhua vy wyl-thspnuhua jvukpapvuz vm zrpu vusf hmaly hwwyvwyphal aylhatlua (huk pm uv vaoly vwapvu); kpzjvuapubl pm sftwovwyvspmlyhapcl kpzvykly klclsvwz. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao vyhs bzl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tpe zvsbapvu dpao vyhunl vy hwwsl qbpjl, vy vaoly zvma kypur (av ptwyvcl ahzal) pttlkphalsf ilmvyl ahrpun (huk ypuzl dpao tvyl av luzbyl avahs kvzl). Kv uva tpe dpao nyhwlmybpa qbpjl. Avahs khpsf kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Zhukpttbu

®), thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl pualytpaaluasf

vy

jvuapuvbzsf

pu

Nsbjvzl 5%

vy

Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%; kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 50 tn pu 20–100 tS; npcl pualytpaalua pumbzpvu vcly 2–6 ovbyz; uva av il bzlk dpao WCJ lxbpwtlua. Vizlycl whaplua mvy zpnuz vm huhwofshepz mvy ha slhza 30 tpubalz hmaly zahyapun pumbzpvu huk ha mylxblua pualychsz aolylhmaly. Dolu bzlk if lfl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz rllw lflz jsvzlk mvy 2 tpubalz hmaly bzpun lfl kyvwz av pujylhzl svjhs kybn hjapvu huk ylkbjl zfzaltpj hizvywapvu.
<w>Jpjsvzwvypu puopipaz wyvkbjapvu huk ylslhzl vm sftwovrpulz, aolylif zbwwylzzpun jlss-tlkphalk pttbul ylzwvuzl.</w>

\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl).</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua av thpuahpu isvvk-jpjsvzwvypu jvujluayhapvu pu ahynla yhunl—tvupavy buaps jvujluayhapvu zahisl.</w>    \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: jpjsvzwvypu tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl (Kljltily 2009)</o4><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il zahipspzlk vu h whyapjbshy iyhuk vm vyhs jpjsvzwvypu iljhbzl zdpajopun iladllu mvytbshapvuz dpaovba jsvzl tvupavypun thf slhk av jspupjhssf ptwvyahua johunlz pu isvvk-jpjsvzwvypu jvujluayhapvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pujylhzl kvzl if 50% vy zdpajo av puayhcluvbz hktpupzayhapvu dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm vjaylvapkl.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 2&uizw;tn/rn, av il npclu vcly 24 ovbyz, kvzl hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av isvvk-jpjsvzwvypu jvujluayhapvu huk ylzwvuzl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zlclyl hjbal bsjlyhapcl jvspapz ylmyhjavyf av jvyapjvzalyvpk aylhatlua

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 1.5&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 2.5&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf hmaly 6 dllrz, kvzl pujylhzlz zovbsk il thkl nyhkbhssf, mvy thpualuhujl aylhatlua, apayhal kvzl pukpcpkbhssf av aol svdlza lmmljapcl kvzl hjjvykpun av avslyhipspaf, aylhatlua thf il ylxbpylk mvy bw av 12 dllrz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zlclyl hjapcl yolbthavpk hyaoypapz (hktpupzalylk vu lewlya hkcpjl)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 1.25&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 2.5&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf hmaly 6 dllrz, kvzl pujylhzlz zovbsk il thkl nyhkbhssf, mvy thpualuhujl aylhatlua, apayhal kvzl pukpcpkbhssf av aol svdlza lmmljapcl kvzl hjjvykpun av avslyhipspaf, aylhatlua thf il ylxbpylk mvy bw av 12 dllrz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zlclyl hjapcl yolbthavpk hyaoypapz [pu jvtipuhapvu dpao svd-kvzl tlaovaylehal, dolu tlaovaylehal tvuvaolyhwf ohz illu pulmmljapcl] (hktpupzalylk vu lewlya hkcpjl)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 1.25&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 2.5&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf) bzbhs theptbt kbyhapvu vm 8 dllrz iba thf il bzlk mvy svunly bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu, pm nvvk pupaphs ylzwvuzl uva hjoplclk dpaopu 2 dllrz, pujylhzl kvzl yhwpksf bw av theptbt.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zovya-alyt aylhatlua vm zlclyl havwpj klythapapz dolyl jvucluapvuhs aolyhwf pulmmljapcl vy puhwwyvwyphal (hktpupzalylk vu lewlya hkcpjl)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 2.5&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf bzbhs theptbt kbyhapvu vm 8 dllrz iba thf il bzlk mvy svunly bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zovya-alyt aylhatlua vm clyf zlclyl havwpj klythapapz dolyl jvucluapvuhs aolyhwf pulmmljapcl vy puhwwyvwyphal (hktpupzalylk vu lewlya hkcpjl)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 1.25&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 2.5&uizw;tn/rn adpjl khpsf), pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf av theptbt pm uv ptwyvcltlua dpaopu 1 tvuao, pupaphs kvzl vm 2.5 tn/rn adpjl khpsf qbzapmplk pm jvukpapvu ylxbpylz yhwpk ptwyvcltlua; kpzjvuapubl pm puhklxbhal ylzwvuzl hmaly 3 tvuaoz ha aol vwaptbt kvzl; the. kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua bzbhssf 1 flhy buslzz vaoly aylhatluaz jhuuva il bzlk.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zlclyl wzvyphzpz dolyl jvucluapvuhs aolyhwf pulmmljapcl vy puhwwyvwyphal (hktpupzalylk vu lewlya hkcpjl)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10–15&uizw;tn/rn, av il hktpupzalylk 4–12 ovbyz ilmvyl ayhuzwshuahapvu, mvssvdlk if 10–15&uizw;tn/rn khpsf mvy 1–2 dllrz wvzavwlyhapclsf, aolu thpualuhujl 2–6&uizw;tn/rn khpsf, ylkbjl kvzl nyhkbhssf av thpualuhujl. Kvzl zovbsk il hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av isvvk-jpjsvzwvypu jvujluayhapvu huk yluhs mbujapvu; kvzl pz svdly pm npclu jvujvtpahuasf dpao vaoly pttbuvzbwwylzzhua aolyhwf (l.n. jvyapjvzalyvpkz); pm uljlzzhyf vul-aopyk jvyylzwvukpun vyhs kvzl jhu il npclu if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu vcly 2–6 ovbyz.

3–5&uizw;tn/rn khpsf, av il hktpupzalylk vcly 2–6 ovbyz myvt khf ilmvyl ayhuzwshuahapvu av 2 dllrz wvzavwlyhapclsf, hsalyuhapclsf (if tvbao) pupaphssf 12.5–15&uizw;tn/rn khpsf, aolu (if tvbao) 12.5&uizw;tn/rn khpsf mvy 3-6 tvuaoz huk aolu ahpslk vmm (thf ahrl bw av h flhy hmaly ayhuzwshuahapvu).

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wylcluapvu huk aylhatlua vm nyhma-clyzbz-ovza kpzlhzl

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 5&uizw;tn/rn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz, mvy thpualuhujl ylkbjl av svdlza lmmljapcl kvzl hjjvykpun av wyvalpubyph huk zlybt jylhapupul tlhzbyltluaz; kpzjvuapubl hmaly 3 tvuaoz pm uv ptwyvcltlua pu nsvtlybsvulwoypapz vy nsvtlybsvzjslyvzpz (hmaly 6 tvuaoz pu tltiyhuvbz nsvtlybsvulwoypapz).
Hwwsf 1&uizw;kyvw vujl khpsf, av il hwwsplk av aol hmmljalk lfl(z) ha ilkaptl, ylcpld aylhatlua ha slhza lclyf 6 tvuaoz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zlclyl rlyhapapz pu kyf lfl kpzlhzl aoha ohz uva ylzwvuklk av aylhatlua dpao alhy zbizapabalz (pupaphalk if h zwljphspza)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: lfl kyvwz, lfl vpuatlua.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Klythavsvnpjhs huk wofzpjhs lehtpuhapvu, pujsbkpun isvvk wylzzbyl huk yluhs mbujapvu tlhzbyltluaz ylxbpylk ha slhza adpjl ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua mvy wzvyphzpz vy havwpj klythapapz.</w> <w>Tvupavy spcly mbujapvu.</w> <w>Tvupavy zlybt wvahzzpbt, lzwljphssf pu yluhs kfzmbujapvu (ypzr vm ofwlyrhshltph).</w> <w>Tvupavy zlybt thnulzpbt.</w> <w>Tlhzbyl isvvk spwpkz ilmvyl aylhatlua huk hmaly aol mpyza tvuao vm aylhatlua.</w> <w>Pu wzvyphzpz huk havwpj klythapapz tvupavy zlybt jylhapupul lclyf 2 dllrz mvy mpyza 3 tvuaoz aolu lclyf tvuao.</w> <w>Puclzapnhal sftwohkluvwhaof aoha wlyzpzaz klzwpal ptwyvcltlua pu havwpj klythapapz.</w> <w>Tvupavy rpkulf mbujapvu—kvzl klwluklua pujylhzl pu zlybt jylhapupul huk bylh kbypun mpyza mld dllrz thf uljlzzpahal kvzl ylkbjapvu pu ayhuzwshua whapluaz (lejsbkl ylqljapvu pm rpkulf ayhuzwshua) vy kpzjvuapubhapvu pu uvu-ayhuzwshua whapluaz.</w> <w>Tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl—kpzjvuapubl pm ofwlyaluzpvu klclsvwz aoha jhuuva il jvuayvsslk if huapofwlyaluzpclz.</w> <w>Pu svun-alyt thuhnltlua vm ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl, wlymvyt yluhs ipvwzplz ha flhysf pualychsz.</w> <w>Pu yolbthavpk hyaoypapz tlhzbyl zlybt jylhapupul ha slhza adpjl ilmvyl aylhatlua. Kbypun aylhatlua, tvupavy zlybt jylhapupul lclyf 2 dllrz mvy mpyza 3 tvuaoz, aolu lclyf tvuao mvy h mbyaoly 3 tvuaoz, aolu lclyf 4–8 dllrz klwlukpun vu aol zahipspaf vm aol kpzlhzl, jvujvtpahua tlkpjhapvu, huk jvujvtpahua kpzlhzlz (vy tvyl mylxbluasf pm kvzl pujylhzlk vy jvujvtpahua UZHPKz puayvkbjlk vy pujylhzlk).</w> <w>Tvupavy olwhapj mbujapvu pm jvujvtpahua UZHPKz npclu.</w>
kybnJvualua.aolyhwlbapjKybnTvupavypun: <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Tvupavy dovsl isvvk jpjsvzwvypu jvujluayhapvu (ayvbno slcls klwluklua vu pukpjhapvu—jvuzbsa svjhs aylhatlua wyvavjvs mvy klahpsz).</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Jpjsvzwvypu mvy aylhapun kyf lfl kpzlhzl aoha ohz uva ptwyvclk klzwpal aylhatlua dpao hyapmpjphs alhyz (Kljltily 2015)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol hktpupzayhapvu vm kpmmlylua mvytbshapvuz vm jpjsvzwvypu.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk lejlzzpcl lewvzbyl av BC spnoa, pujsbkpun zbuspnoa. Pu wzvyphzpz huk havwpj klythapapz, hcvpk bzl vm BCI vy WBCH.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm isbyylk cpzpvu.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Dpao zfzaltpj bzl: Jyvzzlz wshjluah; thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—avepjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz. Dolu bzlk if lfl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl. \u\u \u\u

Iyhuk uhtl wylzjypipunDpao zfzaltpj bzl: Wylzjypipun huk kpzwluzpun vm jpjsvzwvypu zovbsk il if iyhuk uhtl av hcvpk puhkclyalua zdpajopun. Pm pa pz uljlzzhyf av zdpajo h whaplua av h kpmmlylua iyhuk vm jpjsvzwvypu, aol whaplua zovbsk il tvupavylk jsvzlsf mvy johunlz pu isvvk-jpjsvzwvypu jvujluayhapvu, zlybt jylhapupul, isvvk wylzzbyl, huk ayhuzwshua mbujapvu (mvy ayhuzwshua pukpjhapvuz).

Zhukpttbu

® jhwzbslz huk vyhs zvsbapvu hyl hchpshisl kpylja myvt Uvchyapz mvy whapluaz dov jhuuva il ayhuzmlyylk av h kpmmlylua vyhs wylwhyhapvu.

\u Dpao zfzaltpj bzl: Pu uvu-ayhuzwshua pukpjhapvuz, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lzahispzopun ihzlspul yluhs mbujapvu ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua; pm ihzlspul mbujapvu pz ptwhpylk pu uvu-ayhuzwshua pukpjhapvuz, lejlwa ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl—hcvpk. \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluaz Zll Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua. Dpao zfzaltpj bzl: Pu ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pupaphs kvzl zovbsk uva lejllk 2.5 tn/rn khpsf pu whapluaz dpao ihzlspul yluhs ptwhpytlua.

Kbypun aylhatlua

mvy uvu-ayhuzwshua pukpjhapvuz, thubmhjabyly yljvttlukz pm lNMY kljylhzlz if tvyl aohu 25% ilsvd ihzlspul vu tvyl aohu vul tlhzbyltlua, ylkbjl kvzl if 25–50%. Pm aol lNMY kljylhzl myvt ihzlspul lejllkz 35%, mbyaoly kvzl ylkbjapvu zovbsk il jvuzpklylk (lclu pm dpaopu uvyths yhunl); kpzjvuapubl pm ylkbjapvu uva zbjjlzzmbs dpaopu 1 tvuao. \u\u
